Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

2 isravel Puththirar Enakkendru Niyamiththu Seluththugira Parisuththa Vasthukkalaik Kuriththu Aaronum Avan Kumaararum  En Parisuththa Naamaththaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaai Irukkavendum Endru Avargalode Sol; Naan Karththar.

3 andriyum Nee Avargalai Nokki: Ungal Thalaimuraigalil Ulla Sandhadhiyaaril Evanaagilum Thaan Theettuppattirukkumpodhu, Isravel Puththirar Karththarukku Niyamiththu Seluththugira Parisuththamaanavaigalandaiyil Serndhaal, Andha Aaththumaa En Sannidhiyil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupovaan Endru Sol; Naan Karththar .

4 aaronin Sandhadhiyaaril Evan Kushtarogiyo, Evan Pramiyamullavano, Avan Suththamaagummattum Parisuththamaanavaigalil Pusikkalaagaadhu; Pinaththinaale Theettaanavaigalil Edhaiyaagilum Thottavanum, Indhiriyankazhindhavanum,
5 theettuppaduththugira Yaadhoru Oorumpraaniyaiyaagilum Theettulla Manidhanaiyaagilum Thottavanum,
6 saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaan; Avan Jalaththil Snaanampannumvaraikkum Parisuththamaanavaigalil Pusikkalaagaadhu.
7 sooriyan Asthamiththapinbu Suththamaayiruppaan; Adhanpinbu Avan Parisuththamaanavaigalil Pusikkalaam; Adhu Avanudaiya Aagaaram.
8 thaanaai Seththadhaiyum Peerundadhaiyum Avan Pusikkiradhinaale Thannaith Theettuppaduththalaagaadhu; Naan Karththar.

9 aagaiyaal Parisuththamaanadhai Avargal Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkugiradhinaale, Paavam Sumandhu Adhinimiththam Saagaadhapadikku, En Kattalaiyaik Kaakkakkadavargal; Naan Avargalaip Parisuththamaakkugira Karththar.
10 anniyan Oruvanum Parisuththamaanavaigalil Pusikkalaagaadhu; Aasaariyan Veettil Thangiyirukkiravanum Koolivelaiseygiravanum Parisuththamaanadhil Pusikkalaagaadhu.
11 aasaariyanaal Panaththukkuk Kollappattavanum, Avan Veettile Pirandhavanum Avanudaiya Aagaaraththil Pusikkalaam.
12 aasaariyanudaiya Kumaaraththi Anniyanukku Vaazhkkaippattaal, Aval Parisuththamaanavaigalin Padaippile Pusikkalaagaadhu.

13 vidhavaiyaaippona, Alladhu Thallappattavalaana Aasaariyanudaiya Kumaaraththi Pillaiyillaadhirundhu, Than Thagappan Veettil Thannudaiya Ilavayadhil Irundhadhupolath Thirumbavandhu Irundhaaleyaagil, Aval Than Thagappan Aagaaraththil Pusikkalaam, Anniyanaagiya Oruvanum Adhil Pusikkalaagaadhu.
14 oruvan Ariyaamal Parisuththamaanadhil Pusiththadhundaanaal , Avan Adhile Aindhil Oru Pangu Adhigamaaik Koottip Parisuththamaanavaigalodunkooda Aasaariyanukkuk Kodukkakkadavan.
15 avargal Karththarukkup Padaikkira Isravel Puththirarudaiya Parisuththamaanavaigalaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkaamalum,
16 avaigalaip Pusikkiradhinaal Avargalmel Kutramaana Akkiramaththai Sumarappannaamalum Iruppaargalaaga; Naan Avargalaip Parisuththamaakkugira Karththar Endru Sol Endraar.
17 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

18 nee Aaronodum Avan Kumaararodum Isravel Puththirar Anaivarodum Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Isravel Kudumbaththaarilum Isravelil Thangugira Anniyargalilum Thangaludaiya Poruththanaigalinpadiyaagilum Urchaagaththinpadiyaagilum Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaagak Karththarukkuth Thangal Kaanikkaiyai Evargal Seluththappogiraargalo,
19 avargal Thangal Manadhinpadiye Maadugalilaagilum Aadugalilaagilum Vellaadugalilaagilum Pazhudhatra Oru Aanaip Pidiththuvandhu Seluththuvaargalaaga .
20 pazhudhulla Ondraiyum Seluththa Vendaam; Adhu Ungal Nimiththam Angigarikkappaduvadhillai.

21 oruvan Viseshiththa Poruththanaiyaavadhu, Urchaagamaayaavadhu, Karththarukku Maadugalilaagilum Aadugalilaagilum Samaadhaanapaligalai Seluththapponaal, Adhu Angigarikkappadumpadi, Oru Pazhudhumillaamal Uththamamaayirukkavendum.

22 kurudu, Nerisal, Mudam, Kazhalai, Sori, Pun Mudhaliya Pazhudhullavaigalai Neengal Karththarukku Seluththaamalum, Avaigalaale Karththarukkup Palipeedaththinmel Thaganapaliyidaamalum Iruppeergalaaga.
23 neenda Alladhu Kurugina Avayavamulla Maattaiyum Aattaiyum Nee Urchaagapaliyaaga Idalaam; Poruththanaikkaaga Adhu Angigarikkappadamaattaadhu.
24 vidhai Nasunginadhaiyum Norunginadhaiyum Kaayampattadhaiyum Vidhai Arukkappattadhaiyum Neengal Karththarukku Seluththaamalum, Avaigalai Ungal Dhesaththile Paliyidaamalum Iruppeergalaaga.

25 anniyan Puththiran Kaiyilum Ippadippattadhai Vaangi, Dhevanukku Appamaaga Seluththeergalaaga; Avaigalin Kedum Pazhudhum Avaigalil Irukkiradhu; Avaigal Ungalukkaaga Angigarikkappaduvadhillai Endru Sol Endraar.
26 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

27 oru Kandraavadhu Semmariyaattukkuttiyaavadhu Vellaattukkuttiyaavadhu Pirandhaal, Adhu Ezhunaal Than Thaayinidaththil Irukkakkadavadhu; Ettaam Naalmudhal Adhu Karththarukkuth Thaganapaliyaaga Angigarikkappadum.
28 pasuvaiyum Adhin Kandraiyum, Aattaiyum Adhin Kuttiyaiyum Orenaalil Kollavendaam.
29 karththarukku Sthoththirapaliyai Seluththuveergalaanaal Manappoorvamaai Adhai Seluththuveergalaaga.
30 annaaliledhaan Adhu Pusikkappadavendum; Vidiyarkaalammattum Neengal Adhil Ondrum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkavendaam; Naan Karththar.
31 neengal En Kattalaigalaik Kaikkondu, Avaigalinpadi Seyyakkadaveergal; Naan Karththar .
32 en Parisuththa Naamaththaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkaadhiruppeergalaaga; Naan Isravel Puththirar Naduve Parisuththar Endru Madhikkappaduven; Naan Ungalaip Parisuththamaakkugira Karththar.
33 naan Ungalukku Dhevanaayiruppadharkaaga, Ungalai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappanninen; Naan Karththar Endru Sol Endraar.
